dcterms:description: Originally a corpus of English sentences with linguistic structure annotations, it is a collection of 2,499 stories sampled from the three year Wall Street Journal (WSJ) collection of 98,732 stories. A variant of the original dataset, distributed with the Chainer package for Python was used for experiments.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank (PTB)
